name: The Gallery (itch)
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2015.

A puzzle game about being a kid lost in a contemporary art gallery. Best played while listening to your most experimental ambient music. HOW TO PLAY: To open: Run the "Final Build.exe" file. Find your way to the exit by moving the rooms around. C to zoom in and out. Move the room with WASD while zoomed out, move your character with the arrow keys while zoomed in. Space bar to jump. Light green walls are doors. You can only go through doors when there is an adjacent door in the next room. In the third level, the door remains in place even as rooms move around it. Quit with alt+f4

Design by Tegan Valo

Art Direction by Lexie Mason-Davis

Additional Art by Taylor Orendurff and Sonya Neunzert

Code by Justin Thomas
